overview:
Mr. Mickey Weizmann brings over 15 years of business and OSS/BSS technology experience to his role as CEO and President of telcocell. His career has had a focus on OSS and BSS transformation programs worldwide. He has established himself as a leader who can be depended on by his clients to make the right recommendations and decisions to deliver mission critical programs successfully.

At telcocell, Mr. Weizmann has established himself as an accomplished leader, a trusted advisor by his clients, and a value creator that delivers successful results. Mickey built telcocell organically by playing leading roles in mission critical client implementations and is an entrepreneur at heart. His vision from day one for telcocell was to be THE critical component in successful OSS/BSS transformation deliveries for his client’s and is committed to exceeding such expectations.
